snippet: The Texans fell to the Patriots on Dec. 10, the first loss in a late-season slide. They have refused to manufacture bravado for the rematch while embracing their underdog role.
abstract: Houston Texans are preparing for upcoming playoff game against New England Patriots, team they fell to in Dec 2012, first loss in a late-season slide.
lead_paragraph: The Texans fell to the Patriots on Dec. 10, the first loss in a late-season slide. They have refused to manufacture bravado for the rematch while embracing their underdog role.

headline.seo: Rout by Patriots Gives Texans a Quiet Motivation
headline.main: Texans Shrug Off Rout, and Questions It Raised, in Hope of Avenging It
headline.print_headline: Texans Shrug Off Rout, and Questions It Raised, in Hope of Avenging It
